summary: A simple color picker for VIM, based on GTK color chooser dialog.
name: VIM-Color-Picker
description:
VIM Color Picker is a simple color selector, based on GTK color chooser dialog. It permit you to easily insert an hexadecimal color in your CSS or HTML code. 

SCREENSHOT:
    http://static.flogisoft.com/vim/vim_color_picker_0.1.png

USE:
  When your are in insert mode or visual mode, press the <F5> button.
  The color picker dialog appear, select a color and validate.

DEPENDENCIES:
  For working, this script need:
    * VIM 7.x with Python support
    * PyGTK 2.x
install_details: Just copy "color_picker.vim" in your pluggin directory.
